quickInfo.intro: I help designers, small agencies, and businesses turn their ideas into reality. Fueled by Figma,Photoshop, Webstorm, and JavaScript, I craft high-quality, responsive websites that are both CMS-optimized and ecommerce-readyâ€”delivered on time and within budget.

home.quote: Designing for the user first, code for the functionality next.

about-me.heading: About me
about-me.name: Hello, i'm Charlie Nguyen
about-me.description: I bring one and a half years of experience in React.js and Vue.js development, along with expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. My skill set extends to Agile Scrum methodologies, and I'm recognized for my creative thinking and ability to generate fresh ideas for new features. I excel in communication and teamwork, making me a valuable asset for innovative projects, where I can enhance both product functionality and team collaboration.
